content: quote: It's a question of "Should the republican party stop pandering to the fringe and start becoming more mainstream". Had Ron Paul won the primary ticket, the republican party would be strong, because Ron Paul is right on the crux of the issues. So going mainstream is liberal speak for keep on compromising. The problem when conservatives comprimise with liberals is that we lose and they gain because the liberal didn't bring anything to the table the conservative wanted and the liberal wants to see some relaxation on the rule of law the constitution. Well, the conservatives have compromised and gone mainstream so often, they are merely liberal-lites at this point, and the conservative message such as Paul's is fading. The young and middle-aged don't believe the constitution is valid or feel it should change with the current times. America's deviation from the wisdom of the founders is how we got here. America, after a very liberal president (Bush) needed the likes of Ron Paul. I know you're going to call me a sore loser instead of considering what I posted. Ahh, so easily led some us are.

content: quote: It's a question of "Should the republican party stop pandering to the fringe and start becoming more mainstream". Had Ron Paul won the primary ticket, the republican party would be strong, because Ron Paul is right on the crux of the issues. So going mainstream is liberal speak for keep on compromising. The problem when conservatives comprimise with liberals is that we lose and they gain because the liberal didn't bring anything to the table the conservative wanted and the liberal wants to see some relaxation on the rule of law the constitution. Well, the conservatives have compromised and gone mainstream so often, they are merely liberal-lites at this point, and the conservative message such as Paul's is fading. The young and middle-aged don't believe the constitution is valid or feel it should change with the current times. America's deviation from the wisdom of the founders is how we got here. America, after a very liberal president (Bush) needed the likes of Ron Paul. I know you're going to call me a sore loser instead of considering what I posted. Ahh, so easily led some us are.
